entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @HHS_ASH Trump Facts
1. US Pop. = 5% of Global Pop.
2. US Coronavirus deaths 25% of World deaths
3. 27m tests byMarch 31 not even close
4. Trump repeatedly says more testing = high numbers
5. Trump can’t control virus in a secure WH
6. We’ve prevailed=“Mission Accomplished”
#DieForDonnie
